ygData.subject: Arrows
ygData.msgSnippet: Questions: 1)  I ve heard that bow damage was calculated in the following mannor Bow Damage Rating x Arrow Damage Rating + 1 The only arrows I ve had access to
ygData.messageBody:
Questions:

1) I've heard that bow damage was calculated in the following mannor

Bow Damage Rating x Arrow Damage Rating + 1

The only arrows I've had access to have been the store bought arrows that have a damage rating of 1, so as far as I can tell this calculation is true?

2) I've never messed with fletching, but I'm assuming the higher quality arrows actually have damage ratings higher than 1??

3) What is the order of arrows, worst to best? What are they worth?

4) I've just bought myself a nice bow, the single cam one, don't exactally remember the name, but the damage is 16 range 100, what is a fair price on it?

5) Anybody on Veeshan server that wants to sell some better than store bought arrows? As many as you have to sell, I'll buy, I'm willing to put in an order for 100 and wait, if need be....

Thanks,

Salr D'Taynkk
Dark Warrior of The Kith
Veeshan
